name: Testing Standards
description: Rules for test coverage, organization, and workflow

rules.name: Test Coverage
guidelines: Minimum 80% code coverage for business logic
Write tests for all edge cases
Tests must pass before merging code

rules.name: Test Organization
guidelines: Use the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern for unit tests
Group related tests using describe blocks
Use descriptive test names that explain the expected behavior
Mock external dependencies in unit tests

rules.name: Testing Workflow
guidelines: Run tests locally before pushing code
Use Cursor's testing tools to run and debug tests
